text: Nihsandeha allahâ€Œra kache dharma hacche isalama. Ara yadera kitaba deya hayechila tara matabheda kare ni, sudhu tara byatita yadera kache jnanera bisaya asara pare'o nijedera madhye irsabidbesa karechila, ara ye ke'u allahâ€Œra nirdesera prati abisbasa posana kare -- nihsandeha allah hiseba-nikese tatpara.
